meanings.sent1: Eating too much cheese can be constipating for some people.
meanings.sent2: The lack of fiber in his diet was constipating his digestive system.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn traffic jam was constipating the flow of cars on the highway.
meanings.sent4: Her strict rules were constipating the creativity of the team.
meanings.sent5: The narrow hallway was constipating the movement of the furniture.

meanings.definition: Prevent (a fluid or gas) from flowing freely.
meanings.sent1: A clogged drain can constipate the flow of water in the sink.
meanings.sent2: The closed valve constipated the flow of gas in the pipeline.
meanings.sent3: The tangled wires were constipating the electricity from reaching the device.
meanings.sent4: The heavy traffic constipated the movement of vehicles on the road.
meanings.sent5: The dam constipated the natural flow of the river.
